runs.comm: Hello hello! Smith knew it was going to swing in, so launches this one into the orbit.. It goes higher than longer, but has enough legs to make it to the boundary

this is off the middle! He again knows Kula swings it in and he whacks it properly this time, over the deep midwicket fielder.. This one was right of the meat. Ok, maybe not of the middle.. he was looking to hit it straight, but it still travelled all the way..
slower delivery on the stumps, it's a low full toss and the batsman punches it down to long on
he bowls it down the leg side, easy call for a wide
another one down the leg side, and it's too far for Sanga.. this one is runs down all the way to the boundary
corrects his line but there is no swing on this, Gayle comes forward and defends it to off, solidly
comes down the pitch and gets hit on the pads, Kula keeps appealing for an lbw, but that surely pitched outside leg stump..yes way outside leg stump
back of length delivery on off, Gayle stays in the crease and defends it to off
swings across the line and misses, that misses the off stump by a nanometre..
shortish delivery on the stumps, easily flicked away to deep midwicket for a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, Gayle dabs it to square leg
lots of flight on this one, the batsman lunges forward and clips it to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off, Smith doesn't like driving, he powers it down to long on, all along the ground
lovely floater this one! It drifts away in the air, the batsman defends it to the off side
fires in a yorker on the middle, the batsman digs it out to mid-off
another yorker, but this is down the leg side and Malinga is lucky as Smith hits it straight to short fine leg where Herath doesn't collect it cleanly
fuller delivery outside off, Gayle stays stoic, defends it to off
he bowls a slower delivery outside off and beats the batsman as he looks to steer it to the off side
fires this one on the off stump, but Gayle brings down that heavy bat of his in time to push it to mid on
quick back of length delivery outside off, Gayle guides it down to third man for a single
comes down the pitch and flicks the fuller delivery straight to square leg
flatter on the off stump - a seam-up delivery, Gayle takes a step down and punches it to midwicket
slides this across the right-hander and Smith ends up playing for the spin which is not there
this is getting tight now.. He fires this full and Smith sweeps it straight to short fine
he mows across the line and is lucky as this just evades a leaping Thirimanne at midwicket.. that was coming
another good delivery! It keeps going away with the angle and Smith is beaten as he looks to cut

and Malinga does the trick! this is a harmless length delivery outside off and Gayle is a touch slow to bring his bat down, he gets a thick inside edge and that rolls over to the stumps.. No Gayle show tonight..
length delivery on the stumps, Simmons punches it straight back past the non-striker for a single
on the pads, Smith picks an easy single to short fine leg where Herath is a touch slow
bowls a slower delivery on the stumps, Simmons works it away to deep square leg for a single

another deadly blow! Malinga, the captain, is on the job.. His first slower ball deceived Gayle into playing a tame push, his second goes right through Smith and hits the top of off. The batsman was stuck in the crease, but this deviates after pitching on good length area and does the damage
another slower delivery, the batsman defends it off the back foot
fuller delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid off
he charges down the pitch and punches the length delivery to the off side, but that's hit straight to cover
bowls a full toss on the stumps, the batsman punches it straight to midwicket..
fuller delivery on the stumps, he  punches it down to long on for a single
he comes forward and punches the length delivery straight to mid-off
good work by Mathews at cover! He dives to his right to cut off a firm punch and almost generates a run-out.. the batsmen manage to cross over just in time
flatter and on the leg stump, the batsman dabs it to midwicket but can't take a single
tossed up and full on the stumps, Samuels drives it inside out to deep point
floated on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to wide long on for a single
fuller on off, the batsman drives it past a diving cover for a couple to deep extra cover
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
he takes a step down, but can only defend it to cover as the bowler pulls the length back

he takes the wicket of the first ball! That quick slider ends Simmons' innings. The batsman chose to stay back, but that one came in and came in quick and hit the back pad as the batsman looked to cut. That was an excellent delivery to start the spell.. A bit like Shahid Afridi's legspinners..
wonderful backfoot punch by Bravo! He waits on the back foot and crunches it through extra cover, looks set to reach the boundary, but Dilshan at the boundary dives and saves two runs..
quicker on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the crease
turns a bit as this is bowled slower, the batsman comes forward to defend
looks to punch it to off but chops it on the pitch
marginally short and Bravo picks up a boundary with a powerful backfoot punch through midwicket.. Not much wrong with that delivery, but the batsman was quick on his feet
quicker on the middle stump, the batsman gets an outside edge to point as he looks to defend it from the back foot
shorter and on the pads, the batsman whips it easily to deep midwicket for a couple
superb delivery! this is the one that comes in and Samuels didn't read that, he is lucky to get an inside edge on to his pads
goes deep in his crease and punches the flatter delivery to deep extra cover
he stretches and defends the fuller delivery to the off side
flighted and on the pads, the batsman flicks it behind square on the leg side for a single
he pulls out his favourite shot, goes inside out to a flighted delivery and whacks it over the extra cover fielder
tossed up and on the pads, clipped down to deep square leg for a single
allows this one to spin, then opens the face to run it down to Malinga at short third man
he comes down the pitch and almost yorks himself with the fuller one, digs it out to long on
shorter and a superb shot from Bravo sends this scurrying to the extra cover boundary, but it's Dilshan again, he dives full length and saves a certain boundary..
he comes forward and dabs the flatter delivery to cover for a single
pushed through on the pads, the batsman clips it fine on the leg side for a single
floated up to the batsman, the batsman drives it down to long on
that's Herath's carrom ball and Samuels spots it early.. he goes back and pulls it hard to the deep midwicket boundary
quicker delivery down the leg side, easy call for the umpire
fuller on the middle stump line, punched down to long on for a single
he comes down the pitch and punches the full toss straight to cover, misses out on useful runs
comes down the pitch again, now he drives the full delivery straight to midwicket, still no run
starts off with a slower delivery on the stumps, Bravo dabs it to midwicket for a single
back of length delivery on the stumps, Samuels looks for a gap at point, but finds the fielder there
he keeps bowling it slow and it's again hit to point, where Dilshan makes a diving save
bowls a slower full toss outside off, the batsman is beaten on his stroke, gets a toe end to it down the pitch
he drives this fuller offcutter down the ground to long on for a single
now Kula dives at deep point to save a certain boundary, it was a low full toss that was sliced and looked certain for a boundary
no stopping that! Samuels takes a step down and drives this so cleanly through extra cover that no one moves..
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman drives it straight to midwicket
another one hit straight to midwicket, Malinga doesn't even need to move.. That was a full toss too
he punches this one down the ground past the non-striker for a single
fuller and outside off, guess what Bravo does, plays that attractive inside out drive again, easily clears the rope..That shot has got to be one of the prettiest ones around..
fails to pick up a single as he dabs this low full toss straight to backward point
fires in a good yorker on the leg stump, the batsman somehow digs it out to long on

game over for Bravo! He succumbs to the pressure being built over the last few overs. It was a length delivery on the leg stump, the batsman whips it to the leg side but hits it straight towards Mahela at deep square leg..Sammy will have to do it alone today, if at all
superb yorker from Kula, Samuels digs it in the crease
this is super bowling from Kula, right in the blockhole again, Samuels digs it out to wide long on for a couple
he is struggling here as he misses a full toss, gets an inside edge on to his pads and almost runs out Sammy.. Dilshan just had to hit the stumps from point
